name: Kei Arasaka
description: Kei Arasaka(荒坂 敬) (born inTokyo,Japan,1980), was the first child ofSaburo Arasakaand either his first or second wife. From1997to2023, he was the acting CEO of theArasaka Corporation. As the oldest Saburo's three children by fifteen years, as well as his father's most trusted confidante, he was the logical heir to the Arasaka Empire. Kei shared his father's ideals of Arasaka dominating the world no matter the cost. However, he did not have Saburo's temper, instead going about his duties in an efficient and calculated manner. This, along with his habit of rarely showing emotion, led to his...
